description: This file defines a React functional component named Modal, which provides a reusable modal dialog with a header, body, and actions for use in a React application.

methods.name: Modal({ title, open, onClose, children, actions })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a modal dialog with a title, children content, and action buttons.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ title, open, onClose, children, actions }) {$/
